Text:
Excuse me, but how is this a "paedo" post? Ok:
1. The girl is 18+
2.  Even if she was under 18, doesnt make the poster a pedophile. Pedophile is an attraction to pre-pubescent girls or boys. You, Sir, are a troll.

i didn't say "pedo", did I? I said "paedo".
go practice your latin

Im not the one that needs practice: 

Actually, pedo is a derivation of latin word "paedo", while means children. Therehence, a pedopobic person has a fear of children. More correctly, this is spelled and pronounced paedo, not pedo, which is a form of transport.

;)
